entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

CLOUDY

NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
